1.content:
*BUZZ* *BUZZ* *BUZZ* *BUZZ* *BUZZ* *BUZZ* *BUZZ*

That was the sound ringing through your ears as you slowed opened your eyes. The buzzing of the small alarm clock that sat on your dresser near the edge of the bed. You lazily lifted your arm and dropped it onto the snooze button. You didn't want to get up, you were already comfortable under the blanket. You looked over to the end of the mattress only to see your cat turning her head toward you, a little upset that she was woken up.

You eventually got up, standing in nothing but your soft pajamas. You grabbed your clothes you prepared for the night before and started heading into the bathroom. Taking your sweet time, you eventually got into the shower to begin your daily routine. The cold water splashed on your face as it sprayed all over your toned body. After minutes of cleaning yourself, you stepped out of the shower and took a good look at yourself in the full length mirror while drying yourself off.

Though your body didn't really match the description of a 'twig', it was a close comparison. Your round face could only match that great smile of yours, with hair growing only past your shoulders by about an inch. Your breasts 'hanging' out as their size is only described as 'cup size B.' Your stomach being flat and toned due to the healthy diet you've been on for years, giving out a inward curve to your hips. Not much they did anyways with your flat ass, going down to your toned thighs as your whole body is being stood by your petite feet. Nope, puberty really didn't do you much good. Maybe someday that'll change.

You finished your daily routing as usual. Slipping on the outfit, only to brush your teeth, comb and dry the hair, and to put on a good dose of make-up. You soon exited the bathroom only to have your cat quickly follow you behind. You opened the front door and reached out to grab the morning paper. You flipped it open on the table and left it there as you got yourself a bowl of cereal. You couldn't leave the cat out of this either. You reached into the cabinet where you kept the cat food, and poured a small bit into her bowl.

You glanced at the paper as you placed your first spoonful into your mouth. Big bold letters stating 'GRAND OPENING!' appeared on the headline, with a picture of the new mall under it. You knew there was construction going on by your house for the past three months. You figured they'd finished building it eventually, but so soon? You didn't really care. It was hard enough trying to get some peace and quiet around the neighborhood with all that noise going on.

You had nothing planned today, other than to read some boring articles in the paper. You might take a swim in the pool, but definitely not this early. You might as well go to the mall today as see what it's like. Probably need to leave soon so that you don't run into a big crowd planning the same thing. You cleaned up after breakfast and grabbed your purse. It was a nice day out and the mall was just around the corner, shouldn't take more than ten minutes.

"I'll be back later Bee." you said to your cat, who only looked up at you, swaying her tail side to side. You stepped out and locked the door behind you. You started only walking toward the mall only to be greeted by a large banner hanging above the doors. You entered the mall and, just liked you hoped, found that it was practically empty. Might as well look around.
1.title: The Mall's Grand Opening!

11.content:
You decided to enter the clothing department. You planned on buying some new outfits for the summer anyway. You walked in the store and saw Karen walking down an aisle. She instantly looked at you and turned her head, pretending she didn't notice you. She was always the shy kid in the group. In all honesty, you found it a little cute. But you decided to looked around the aisles for something new.

You notice that every aisle is strangely marked, all of the clothing being different. Most of the clothing didn't seem right. You walked down the weight aisle first as saw all different kinds of outfits in different shapes and sizes. The outfits were displayed from smallest to largest, something you noticed was that there weren't really many small outfits to choose from.

You then went down the aisle that was labeled 'gender.' The rows were split into two, one half labeled 'Men', the other 'Women.' A detail you noticed in the women's section was that it had a section full of bras and panties with clothing of all sizes, some so enormous you didn't believe they could fit anyone.

Looking at the 'age' aisle, different outfits of all kinds of shapes and sizes. The clothing were displayed from outfits of younger kids to older adults. There were diapers and baby clothing. Kid shirts and teenage outfits. More mature looking uniforms and business suits for a more older look. Smooth dresses and suspenders, canes, and walkers options for the much older look. Very strange.

On to the 'size' aisle, it got even weirder. Like the weight aisle, it was displayed from smallest to largest. Outfits that were as small as your hand ranged all the way to outfits that were as big as giants. An employee noticed you browsing the aisles and decided to walk up to you.

"Hello there. I noticed you're looking around the aisles. Do you need help looking for anything?" said the man with the name tag saying 'Taylor.'

"No thank you." you replied. "Just looking around for a summer outfit."

"Well, the dressing rooms are around the corner. Feel free to try on anything you'd like."

You decided to go back to a certain aisle to try on an outfit that might look good on you. Which aisle do you go back to?
11.title: The Clothing Store

111.content:
You took his advice and decided to go back to the weight aisle to try on an outfit that you though would look good on you, even if it was a little big for you. You looked through the steel racks looking for a certain outfit hanging on one of the metal hangers. You finally found it. The bright pink T-shirt with the red heart-shaped patterns on them, along with the jean shorts that were cut off above the knee. You took the outfit and walked straight to the dressing rooms.

As you set the outfit on the door hook, you noticed a number sticking out of the shirt with a number on it. You took a closer look and saw that the number was clearly.....
111.title: The 'Weight' Aisle

choices: You don't respond and put on the shirt to further test the clothing's power.
1111.content:
You expected there to be a number to be in a dress size scale or at least in inches, but for some reason the clothing read "250". Perplexed, you held the shirt up to your chest to do an eye measurement. Sure, it was a little big, it might make a good sleeping shirt, but it wasn't huge. Taylor, the employee, took notice to the confused look on your face.

"Something the matter, miss?"

"Yeah...Is this number right? Do you guys do some sort of weird measurement scale?"

Taylor gave a short laugh. "Something like that. This is your first time in the mall isn't it?"

You furrowed your brow, slightly annoyed that he seemed to be molding you as some sort of confused tourist. "Yeah, so what?"

"Sorry, I didn't mean to offend you. Just trust me when I say you'll have no problem with fitting in any of our clothing, I guarantee it."

Now it was almost like he was calling you fat. You huffed and threw the outfit over your shoulders, determined to prove him wrong. "Whatever. Where's the changing room?"

He jabbed his thumb towards several doors on the far wall behind him. You stormed past him with clothing in hand and slammed the door shut behind you. You had half a mind to report that guy to his employer for being rude, but you turned to the task at hand. If these clothes didn't fit, which you were positive they wouldn't, you were going to give him such a hard time he'd regret picking fun at you.

You stripped down to your bra and panties, tossing the outfit you were wearing in a heap to the side. The jean shorts you picked out might as well go on first, you stretched them out by the waist to find that it almost was as long as your arms.

"I should have gotten a belt..."

You didn't even need to unbutton them, they were so big. All you had to do was step in them and pull them up. Of course, there was no way they could rest on your hips beginning as large as they were.

"Pff, I knew it. That bastard's gonna have hell to pay..."

You were about to pull it down when you felt a weird tingle in your legs. You were beginning to feel really odd and...heavier down below. Maybe you were just lightheaded, you sat down on the bench in the changing to a far more cushion-like seat than you expected.

"Huh. I gotta lay off those burgers."

That's when you realized that you were rising off the bench ever so slightly. You looked down at your legs and let out a squeak of surprise. Your lower body was inflating out like a balloon! The perfect legs you spent hours working on every week were disappearing from your very eyes! Your thighs and legs widened with fat as the pants that had been falling off your waist just moments ago were now fitting snugly. Though your panties were digging into your plump crotch now.

All you could do was just stare at your legs for a moment. You closed your eyes.

"No...This is a dream. It didn't happen. You'll just wake up falling out of bed as usual."

You opened them but were still greeted by a pair of massive legs underneath a tight looking jean shorts. Logically, there was no way this could happen. There was no scientifically plausible way putting on a simple pair of pants could make you overweight from the waist down. But why was your heart racing so much? You weren't actually getting a thrill out of this, were you? After all, you spent most of your life staying in shape and watching what you ate. This wasn't how you normally acted, this whole situation wasn't normal.

Yet...You couldn't help but feel a hint of excitement out of this. You had just physically changed yourself in an instant. There was a rush of adrenaline from the power behind the ability to alter yourself at will. Is that what these clothes did? Change people?

A knock at the door interrupted your thoughts.

"Everything alright in there, miss?"

After a pause, you responded...
1111.title: '250', pleasantly plump.

choices: "I think I'll browse the store more."
"I think I'll pay for this and come back later."
11111.content:
You responded by kicking the door down right on top of poor Taylor. Your predicament ultimately was the result of one thing, the bastard who was twitching due to being crushed underneath the door didn't tell you what the clothes did. Normally you weren't the violent type unless something REALLY pissed you off. Watching your well-toned legs disappear before your eyes just happened to be on that list. Eyes seething with rage, you stepped off the door and lifted the frightened Taylor up by the collar.

"WHAT! DID! YOU! DO!?"

"I-I didn't do a-anything, I swear!"

You began to violently shake him. "Liar! You never told me what these clothes did! Do you know how much effort it was to keep myself in shape all these years!?"

"I-I can only imagine, m-ma'am..."

"FIX. THIS."

"Absolutely! Just please, put me down!"

You loosened your grip and Taylor came toppling to the floor, gasping for air. You cracked your knuckles, not taking your eyes off of him.

"Okay!" He said between deep breaths. "All you have to do is take the your pants off."

You slugged him right across the face. "What!?"

"I didn't mean it like that! I meant that if you take off the outfit you put on, you'll return to your normal self! I promise!"

You glared at him, he yelped and hid behind the counter. Satisfied that he wouldn't try anything funny, you stomped off to another changing room with a working door, grabbing your old jeans and the remaining outfit from the previous room. Once you were in, you kept the door opened a crack to keep an eye on Taylor.

The short jeans were a little hard to get off around your thick waist. You didn't want to admit it, but you had an impressive butt like this though being skinny waist up made it seem almost comical. Once you slipped them off your pear-shaped thighs though, they flopped to the ground around your legs. Your legs started to revert back to their old form in an instant. In less than five seconds the damage that had been done was no existent. Sighing in relief, you put on your old jeans and walked out to find Taylor still cowering behind the cash register.

You giggled innocently. "Um...Sorry about that. I guess I got a little freaked out."

"Alittle!? You went berserk! I thought I was going to die!"

"Heh. Well, I hope there's no hard feelings...So, every outfit in this store changes you?"

Taylor cleared his throat, trying his best to seem professional. "Yes, all clothing here will fit you no matter what size you are because it physically changes your body to match it. Anything from height, weight, gender, or age can be manipulated to suit whatever desire you wish. Nothing is permanent, you will revert back to normal once you take the clothing off."

"Well that's...odd...But at least it's safe. Are there any normal stores here in this mall?"

"Oh, I doubt it."

"Hmm..." You said, looking down at the outfit in your hands. You were starting to get it. The tag read 250 because it was in the weight section. 250 was the size of the body that it was supposed to give you in pounds. You shuddered to think what would have happened if you grabbed a 600 or more by mistake.

The little pinch of excitement you had when you looked down and saw your legs had blown up like sausages was starting to really nag the back of your head. You could alter your body as much as you wanted with no consequences. It seemed to be a tempting offer and there was a deep carving for it in the pit of your stomach.

Smiling you said to Taylor...
11111.title: You're pretty ticked...

111111.content:
"I think I'll browse the store some more." You couldn't resist the temptation of trying on some more of the clothing. And though you'd never admit it, it was exciting to walk around uninhibited and overweight; being the complete opposite of how you always went about your life and having the power to change right back.

Taylor rolled his eyes, as if expecting that answer. "Take your time then. I'll be here to answer any questions."

But you were already nose deep in the racks of clothing before he could finish speaking. Taylor scuffed and pulled out his cellphone to begin texting; seeing as you lost interest to what he had to say and he was sure you'd stay out of trouble now that you knew the power of the clothing in the store, there didn't seem to be much need to keep an eye on you.

You went straight for the Weight aisle again, picking up a few outfits that looked kind of cute. There wasn't much need to pay attention to the tags considering it was all going to fit you anyway, and it didn't take long before you were literally carrying a mountain of various outfits that were all different shapes and sizes. You were sure to get everything too, from bras to shoes.

When Taylor looked up from his cellphone at you approaching the register, he had a surprised look on his face. "Do you...Have the money for all this?"

"How rude! Of course I do." You said as you pulled out a credit card. With the money from your grandparents you could probably buyout the whole store and still have plenty of money to spare.

"Alright...It's your cash."

It took several minutes to ring everything up and even longer for the both of you pack everything in bags. There was only one question left...Wear one of the new outfits here or wait until you got home?
111111.title: A bigger wardrobe.

11113.content:
"Everything alright in there, miss?"

After a pause, you don't respond and put on the shirt to further test the clothing's power. You drape the shirt over you as watch the magic happen. You look down past the shirt and feel your waist bloating up. You soon have a belly, and then a gut spilling over your lap like dough. You feel the sleeves against your arms as they sag down to gravity. You start to poke your arm, only to notice your fingers puffed up like little sausages. The changes stop as you somehow feel your underwear loosen up, as if they just grew with you.

You stand up and take a good look in the mirror. Your cheeks are puffed out a bit and you now have a double chin. The outfit fit you perfectly now. Wait, was that what Taylor meant? That it would fit you no matter what. You looked like someone that weighed 250 pounds...the same number that was on the tag.

You had no reaction to this, simply because you didn't know how to react! On one hand, all the hard work you spent keeping a toned body, was now pointless, all thanks to a bunch of weird clothes that had no scientific explanation of doing this to you. On the other hand, you didn't have to worry about that anymore! With a plus, you now have your breasts and ass you've always wanted. You had to find out how this happened. you opened the stall and stood still as you saw _____ simply starring at you.
11113.title: Evening Yourself Out

choices: You get pulled into a magic show in the mall.
111132.content:
A head of red hair was the first thing that caught your eye when you opened up the stall door. It didn't take long for your to recognize who it was immediately, it was Karen who had just been walking around the store.

Luckily, she didn't seem to recognize you at first, though she did start blushing profusely. "O-oh...U-umm...Sorry m-ma'am, I thought this stall was empty."

With that she quickly turned around and ran down the aisle. This left you somewhat confused but at the same time grateful she didn't know who you were. While this new and unique power with the clothing would be fun to play with, the last thing you would want was for anyone to know who you were while you were super-sized. Shrugging, you turned to the matter at hand.

Seeing as Karen was still in the store (and still watching you while blushing through a rack of clothing), you couldn't just change back to your old clothing and walk out without her knowing who you were. Maybe with some persuasiveness, that Taylor guy would let you walk out with the outfit on.

Forming the plan in your head, you stepped out with your old outfit under your chubby arm and headed straight for the cash register. Taylor, who was busy texting, looked up at you and asked.

"Is everything to your liking, miss?"

"Yes...In fact I was wondering if I could just pay for it right now and walk out with it on."

Taylor laughed, as if people always asked the question. "Sure, sure. Let me just take the tags off."

He took a pair of scissors and snipped the '250' tags on both the shirt and pants then he swiped the tags on the scanner. You quickly paid the price and thanked Taylor then you quickly left the store. You were heading for a bathroom so that you could change into your original outfit, then you could head back into the store and buy as many clothes to enhance your figure as you wanted without Karen being the wiser.

On the way to the restroom...
111132.title: A cute little red head.

choices: "you look alot like someone I know."

1111321.content:
You were heading for a bathroom so that you could change into your original outfit, then you could head back into the store and buy as many clothes to enhance your figure as you wanted without Karen being the wiser.

On the way to the restroom, you noticed a problem with your plan as Karen followed you. It wasn't completely obvious, but it was certain that she had an interest in following you and tried not to be noticed by you. You eventually went down the long seperate hallway that led to the restrooms and the main office. After seeing that they were the only places you could go, you realized that you made the mistake of going down a dead end. You went into the women's restroom and grunted as you saw your new fattened reflection in the mirror.

You now had to face this problem dead on. You coudln't change into your old outfit, then Karen would definitely put two and two together. You had to go out the hall eventually where Karen would sure to be waiting for you. Hopefully, she won't recognize you. Even if she does, she really not one to blab about everything like Cassandra. If you asked her to keep this all a secret, she most likely would due to being so shy. What's the worst that could happen?

You waddled out of the restroom and made your way out the hall, already seeing Karen poking out the corner only to suddenly turn away. You didn't really want to get her attention head on, but just on the off chance she did recognize you, you had to make sure she'd keep this whole thing a secret.

"Um, can I help you miss?" you asked, trying to sound as nice as possible. "Sorry, but I think you have an interest in following me."

"OH, umm......I'm sorry. Gosh.....you must think I'm a creep." She said while facing toward the ground. "Sorry if I upset you, I was just trying to get a better look at you.....well......because........"
1111321.title: Karen Follows

1112.content:
"400?" You mutter to yourself. What on earth could that mean? With your curiosity peaked you pick it up and head to the changing rooms near the back. As you head on your way you see several other women heading to and fro, reading labels and picking out styles. Everything seemed to be incredibly normal however the tag of all things seemed off.

"Excuse me ma'am, are you here for the changing rooms?" A women said wearing a neat blue dress. At first you were startled from her abrupt entrance, however after composing yourself you turn to face her.

"Yes, I saw this dress and was curious. Are there any rooms open?" You say looking down the aisle.

"If you wouldn't mind me checking the tag quickly." The women said. You passed her over the dress, she'd quickly read over the tag and began leading you to the far left aisle. There had been less doors than before however along with each one being slightly farther apart. "This one looks good, if you wouldn't mind heading in." She said directing you into the room.

"Thank you." You say, nodding your head as you headed in. Just as you reach the center of the room the women closes the door behind you leaving nothing but you, the suit and the silence.

"Lets see here..." You say as you begin taking off your current clothes. Your suit seemed to fit perfectly, without it even being labeled as a small it just seemed to slip right on. "This is so weird..." You mutter to yourself. Just as you begin to head to the full wall mirror you begin to feel a slight bloated feeling. As if you'd eaten way to much however you had barely anything since this morning.

At first you ignore it, however the moment you see yourself in the mirror it becomes painfully clear what was happening. Your gut, which had once been a nice slim figure was growing immensely. The longer you stood more real it felt until eventually it stopped. Barely able to move due to shock you notice a small scale sitting in the corner of the room. At least you might be able to know how much you weight.

As you step on the true impact of your weight kicks in, the feeling of being overweight was surprising as it was completely alien to you. Simply walking to the other side of the room tired you out, similar to running a marathon.

"400!" You blurt out!

choices: The boy's outfit, you want that tomboyish look

You decided to go back to the gender aisle to try on something new. There was something about it that made you want to look there than anything else. As you were looking through the metal hangers, you found a black T-shirt with a few metal logos on the front of it. With it were a pair of cut out jeans with rips and a hole in one of the knees. The only situation was that it was an outfit meant for a boy, not a girl. You could probably take a look at it later, you didn't really know if you could pull off the whole tomboy look.

You searched through another row, completely filled with bras and panties. Some of yours have been worn out lately, maybe you could get some here. You looked through them, all being different sizes. You stood there and pondered on what to try out first.
112.title: The 'Gender' Aisle

choices: You head for the toilet, you need to take a better look.

1122.content:
You find your eyes wandering to the bigger bra. Although you aren't worryingly thin, you have noticed that the boys are more easily distracted by those with a larger bust. You glance in either direction down the aisle, nobody there. Picking up the bigger bra, you hold it up in front of yourself, as you try to picture yourself filling it.... the comforting weight... the extra attention.

Blushing a little at the idea of the extra attention.

Checking the label you find it is a DD-cup. Sure, it would draw all of the guys' eyes, and a few of the women too. But it would also draw unwanted attention, and give you a sore back and shoulders.

You give a little giggle and put the bra back on the rail. As you do, it catches your eye. Something's wrong.

With a gasp you see what it is. On the hanger is the bra you put on this morning. You always liked the little flowery decorations, and the label proclaiming it a B-cup is apparent, too.

Even more self-conscious now, you glance to either side again. Still nobody there, thank God.

You pull at the mo-hair neck of your jumper, and check what you already suspect. You are now wearing the bra... The straps are wider than on your previous bra, and you don't fill the cups either.

Uncertain what to do you, look around for ... you don't know what.... but you don't want to be arrested for stealing...

Your heart starts racing faster, and you gulp air into your lungs.

As you find your vision starting to spin you spot that your old bra... the one on the hanger has a security tag on it. With one hand on the rail for support, you try to run the other over your bra....

There isn't a tag on it. You decide to get away from here as fast as possible.

Walking down the aisle helps, even if the girls are more mobile and visible. The freedom of the new bra just isn't holding them in place properly.
1122.title: A bigger bra size

11222.content:
Even now with the girls moving rather freely, expanding as you walk, the cups themselves seem to be spreading wider. Your mind boggles at the size they'll finally end up.

Your whole body convulses, and you jump to your new final size.



Your breasts strain every single stitch in every direction on your poor put upon bra. The slightest movement threatens to topple you, and you find a chair to slump backwards into. The chill of the padding tells you how abbreviated your skirt is too. More like a tartan belt, than anything else.

As best you can, you peer past your bust. Shaking your head, you wonder how such curves could match up with your slender arms and legs.... Hell, you don't even have much of an ass.

Out of the two, the uniform just seemed more appealing. Your curiosity as to why this was here grew the more you looked at it. Without a second glance you picked up the outfit and headed towards the changing rooms.

1141.content:
You closed the door behind you and started stripping down. Once you were down to your underwear, you struggled to put the shirt on, as it seemed to be far too small for you. After battling with it for a while, you moved on to the jeans, not even managing to pull them up all the way.

"Why did I even pick these clothes? They're obviously too small for me." You said to yourself as you felt a tingle all over your body.

You panicked, this didn't feel normal at all. Glancing around, you noticed that the room seemed to be rapidly growing around you. Looking down, it seemed as though the once too tight blue t-shirt would be rather baggy now and the jeans would need a belt to prevent them falling.

You stared for at the mirror attached to the door. Unable, or perhaps unwilling, to believe that your body has shrunk like this.

*knock**knock**knock* is all you heard on the door. "Is everything okay in there ma'am?" You noticed that it's the voice of that employee that was 'helpful' earlier. You made the necessary adjustments to your clothes and reached up as high as you could to unlock the door.

"NO! These clothes! They...they did something!" you scream in your higher pitched voice.

He just gives you another smile. "Well, that's what you should expect when you take clothes from the 'Size' aisle."

You just stared, fuming.

You noticed the receipt and looked at the title of the necklace. "Amber of the Shrinking Giantess." You take the necklace out of the case and notice that it had two sides to the crystal. One with a darker tone of orange, the other being lighter. You thought nothing of it. You pulled your hair back and put the necklace on, glowing in the window light.

1442.content:
The amber necklace looked so dazzling and radiant, I simply had to try it on. However, I quickly glanced at my reflection in the vanity mirror. A simple T-shirt, although nice and tight, helping to add emphasis to my slightly below-average breasts...suddenly, I decided I wanted to try out my new necklace with something more...showy.

I dug into my closet, eventually finding my old prom dress. An elegant sky-blue strapless gown with ruffles and a front split. Ah yes, I fondly remembered how it showed off my shapely, toned legs. I swear I could see some of the guys pop boners as I passed by, much to the chagrin of their dates. Unfortunately, the guy I had gone to the prom with was a bit of a jackass, and I called it off weeks later. That reminds me, I never did let Bryce see me in this dress. Perhaps I should soon....

http://24.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_man7hp...

I quickly slip out of my t-shirt and jeans, then slide into my old dress. Oooooh, I had forgotten how snugly it fit me, how it silky softness made me feel like such a wild seductress. I zipped up the back, then put on some strappy blue 5-inch heels and dangly earrings to complete the ensemble. I walked back over to my vanity mirror, lifting the hem of my dress with one hand and doing a little twirl. Yes, I would definitely find an excuse to let Bryce see me in this dress.

But alas, it was time to add the last puzzle piece. I grabbed the necklace off my dresser and put it on, absentmindedly noting the lighter shade or orange was facing out....

At once, a wave of vertigo washed over me. My arm lashed out, grabbing my dresser for support with one hand while holding my head with the other. A few seconds later, my vision started to clear, but even without my eyes, I could tell something was very wrong. The hand that grabbed the dresser, it was...level with my head? My vision then cleared, and suddenly everything seemed bigger! My dresser...it was just as tall as me, and seemed to be growing even bigger! I whirled around, taking in how everything else in my room - my vanity desk, my bed, my entertainment center - were getting bigger as well! For some reason, my clothes weren't changing size.

Or maybe they were! I finally realized what was happening. My room wasn't getting bigger...I WAS SHRINKING! This 'Amber of the Shrinking Giantess'...it wasn't just some marketing ploy of a name! It really was making me shrink! Now I was no taller than my bed. How small would I get?!

You stared at the floating multicolored orbs of helium floating around the store, wondering why you came in here again. There had been a nagging little tickle in the back of your brain that told you to come in here, but you couldn't for the life of you remember why. At that moment, a particularly large and glittered covered balloon floated by your face. It read in big blue letters printed on the side 'It's party time!'

You slapped the top of your head and said out loud. "Of course, the party!" Only to blush in realization that Susan was giving you an odd look.

"Sorry...," you quickly apologized. "I just remembered something was all."

You had been invited to party earlier in the week and you had totally forgotten until now. Cassandra, a girl in your class, was having her eighteenth birthday party while her parents were out on vacation for the summer. Even though the two of you never really saw eye to eye- actually, you really hated each other - she went out of her way to invite everyone from your class. Wishful thinking had you hope that Bryce, the guy whose attention you were trying to get, had convinced Cassandra to invite you to the party as well. Cassandra also had her eyes on him as well, giving you a good reason to loathe the girl. That and her self centered airhead attitude that made you want to slit your throat and kill yourself if stuck in a conversation with her.

The party was in two days. It'd probably be an unsupervised drinking fest, you wouldn't get much entertainment out of it other then a few laughs from the stupid things the drunks would be doing (you didn't drink after all). You wouldn't even be interested it if Bryce wasn't going and even then you were only going to prevent Cassandra from getting her hands on him. You liked solitude more than parties, after all.

The catch to going, however, was that everyone had to bring something for the party. It didn't matter what: plates, food, music, balloons. Anything would do. Considering you were in a balloon shop.

"What would you recommend for a party?" you asked Susan.

"A party? Hmmm. Well there is a party pack, it has all the types of balloons you see around the store and then some."

"How much is it?"

"$24.99."

That wasn't too bad. Loads cheaper than what you expected you were going to have to pay. Satisfied, you had Susan ring up the bag, which was bigger then you thought it would be, and you quickly brought it home.

Due to rushing out of the mall, you didn't even bother to check to see what sort of balloons were in the giant bag and Susan had been vague with what she meant by 'all the types of balloons'. Curiosity eventually got the best of you so you tore open the plastic wrapping and dumped the balloons on the floor of your room only to discover Susan wasn't being vague at all. You give your thick love handle a shake, and rise with a heave from the bed, a large wet stain seeping into the sheets where you sat. Taking a seat before the opened F.O.R.M. program, you shiver from the cold wooden seat against your bare skin, as you start reading the computer screen.

“Why certainly sir!” The young nerdy man responded. “Aside from our usual sections we have a whole plethora of goodies waiting in the aisles. Our Gizmos and Gadgets Aisle has a ton of products that you may be interested, from Cell Phones, to Remotes, and even some stuff that we consider to be “high tech”. Of course if innovative and futuristic stuff ain’t your deal, then we do have some stuff in the “Retro” aisle; Home to older outdated, but still well beloved pieces of technology for those that enjoy the “Good old Days”!

You thought for a bit as you looked at the two aisles. On one hand seeing some older tech may be kind of neat, but on the other hand the newer stuff probably had more to offer....
155312.title: other sections

15532.content:
The small auditorium is about three-quarters full when you enter. Up on stage a pair of identical looking women are doing basic magic tricks and warming the crowd up, while a countdown projected behind them from...somewhere...counts down to the show proper beginning. Finding a free seat on one of the aisles, you settle in to watch the warm up act. The tricks aren't anything spectacular, but the two women performing them are absolutely gorgeous and the sparkly leotards they're wearing really flatter their curvy figures.

When the countdown hits zero, a voice from nowhere cries out "That's it, time to start. Seal the doors!" A loud clap echoes through the room, and the doors at the rear of the auditorium slam shut, apparently on their own. As people react to this, there's a bang and a flash and centre stage is engulfed by smoke. You join about half the crowd in applauding the showmanship as a androgynous figure in tuxedo strides out of the smoke. "Welcome, ladies and gentlemen, to a magic show like nothing you've ever seen before!" The magician's voice, like their figure, is rather ambiguous - you have no clue if they're male or female. "I am the Amazing Ay, and these are my two lovely assistants Bee and Cee." The magician indicates the two leotard clad women with a wave of the hand, but none of them do anything to indicate which is Bee and which is Cee.

"We've got a spectacular show for you today, folks! Astounding feats and astonishing transformations, unmatched by anything else on Earth!" Ay continues their introduction. "Now, I like to get right into things rather than standing around talking, so without further ado, let's get underway with our first act! We're kicking things off today with that old classic, hypnotic regression! Can I get a volunteer from the audience to take part in the hypnotic regression act, please?!"
15532.title: A magic show going on in a side auditorium

choices: You feel your adult cares and knowledge melting away
Snatches of scenes from past lives flash before you eyes
155321.content:
You think for a moment then put your hand up. You're not sure of the magician means past life regression or age regression, but either should be fun, and what's the harm, really?

Surprisingly no one else puts their hands up, and after giving it a few seconds more, Ay gives an exaggerated sigh and says "Well, I guess that makes the choice of which volunteer to pick easy, doesn't it. Will the young lady on the right hand aisle, the only one to have put her hand up, please come up and join us on the stage!"

You stand and walk to the front, where Bee (or possibly Cee) helps you on to the stage with an easy hand and steers you over to stand next to Ay. It's a little intimidating standing up her in front of everyone, especially when you realise there are several people you know in the crowd! Karen is in the front row, looking politely interested and smile and waves when she sees you seeing her. Bryce and Dave are a few rows back, and Bryce gives you a thumbs up, prompting a slight blush. Finally, Cassandra is near the back, sneering at everything in a way that makes you wonder why she's even here.

Ay smiles and shakes your hand. "Give a big hand for our first (and hopefully not only) volunteer, everyone!" She waves at the crowd to clap, and when the polite applause dies down, continues. "Now, I would ask who you are, but I don't think I need to. This is your card, right?" She produces a small white card from inside one of your sleeves and shows it to you. Surprised by what you read, you nod in surprise. Everything on the card is right!

"Excellent!" Ay says with a grin. "Now, let me just blow this up so everyone can see it...." She half turns and flings the card toward the back of the stage, Somehow it expands as it goes, until it takes up the whole back wall, the words on it plain for all to see.

Emily
Age 18
Recent High School Graduate


You make an impressed noise, as does much of the crowd. Even watching it up close, you've no idea how the magician did that!

Ay gives the crowd a moment to be impressed, then continues. "Now, just one thing before we can get on with the act. You need to be dressed for the part! Bee! Cee! Bring the cloth!"

The two assistants step in form the wings one holding a large multi-coloured sheet, the other holding a bolt of sparkly pink cloth. The one with the sheet hands it off to Ay and takes one end of the bolt and the assistants move towards you, wrapping you from head to toe in sparkling fabric in an instant! Before you and react to this, Ay throws the sheet over your head, plunging you into darkness and cutting off all sound! You can't even see or feel the stage beneath you, and when you cry out your voice seems to be swallowed up by a vast emptiness. After a long moment something taps you on the head and you hear a voice, as though at a great distance, say "Presto-Changeo!" The sheet is ripped off your head, and you're back on the stage, the crowd gasping in shock. Looking down, you gasp too, and feel a blush creep across your face as you realise you clothes have been replaced by a sparkly pink leotard!

Before you can come up with a reaction to this, Ay starts speaking again. "Right, now that everything's ready, let's move on to the main event. The hypnosis! Emily, if you would...look into my eyes." Ay places a gentle hand on your chin and lifts your gaze to meet theirs. As you look into the magician's bright green eyes, the world seems to swirl around you, and...everything.....falls.........away.............
155321.title: Volunteering for the magic act

info.description:
You kept hearing about this new mall that's being built. You just realized that today was the opening day. Unknown to you, things are about to get interesting.

The same mall featured in the 'Mall of Transformation,' this particular story deals with a different set of characters to interact with. This interactive involves weight gain, gender change, breast/butt expansion, age change, growth, shrinking, and more transformations.

Rules:
1) No cameos, greetings, or mentioning of the characters in the first interactive. This is a new story with new characters!
2) Do not submit one sentence answers, make it at least a detailed paragraph.
3) Characters must not die.
4) If there's an addition there may be a chance that I'll edit it. Mostly just fixing the grammar.
5) No transformation in the story is permanent, it can always be reversed somehow, though it doesn't have to be an option.
6) Do not end the story too soon.
7) Do not post sexual writing that involves Age Changes.
8) Keep an eye on this page for further updates such as rules, additional characters, etc.

Special thanks to gene_clot for helping me use some of his characters.
Main Characters:

You - Height: 5'5'' Weight: 115 pounds Age: 18 Interests: Bi-Sexual

You are the Protaganist. You are an eighteen year old teenager girl who just got done with high school two weeks ago. You just started having your own place with your friends living in the same neighborhood. Money's not an issue right now with the inheritance from your grandparents. The mall has just been built, so you decide to go check it out for a bit.

Karen - Height: 5'4'' Weight: 110 pounds Age: 18 Interests: Secretly Lesbian

A short, skinny and reserved redhead. Karen is your typical shy girl next door. Started working as a waitress at a local restaurant in hopes of meeting new people, but finds it hard to come out of her shell. Longs for a change in her repetitive life. You've always thought she seemed kind of cute.

Bryce - Height: 5'9 Weight: 145 pounds Age: 17 Interests: Straight

An average, all around good guy. Good looking but not vain about his appearance in any way, likes keeping himself busy. Very kind and incredibly loyal to his friends, Bryce is the 'go to guy' for all of his buddies. Unknown to him, you sort of developed a crush on him.

Dave - Height: 5'11'' Weight: 185 pounds Age: 19 Interests: Straight

A simple name for a simple guy. A natural born slacker with no sense of work ethic, Dave spends more effort avoiding work than he would actually spend doing the work. Graduated from high school with average grades, he lazes around without a care in the world, which has attributed to his chubby frame.

Cassandra - Height: 5'10' Weight: 130 pounds Age: 18 Interests: Straight

A material girl if ever there was one. Obsessed with social status and flashy things, this woman believes herself to be Queen amongst all other women. Decked out in stiletto heels and tight fitting mini skirts to show off her thin body, she lets people know that she gets what she wants.
